title: Metacognitive Strategy Design for Efficient Multimedia Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic statistics and algebraic concepts, experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Mathematics retraining program aimed at enhancing workplace data analysis competencies; interactive learning using real-time video conferencing tools in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the cognitive impacts of multimedia design depending on the presence or absence of redundant text
Learners can select non-redundant multimedia materials with actual comprehension-enhancing effects with 80% accuracy
Learners can develop and apply a self-monitoring rubric that evaluates their metacognitive judgments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
